g descriptor para sa path ng receive address:</p>
<pre><code>wpkh([bf1dd55e/84'/0'/0']xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/0/*)
</code></pre>
<p>At ang path ng pagbabago ng address:</p>
<pre><code>wpkh([bf1dd55e/84'/0'/0']xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/1/*)
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Kunin at tandaan ang checksum para sa receive address descriptor, sa case na ito <code>tpnxnxax</code>:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli getdescriptorinfo \
  'wpkh([bf1dd55e/84h/0h/0h]xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/0/*)'
</code></pre>
<pre><code class="language-json">{
  &quot;descriptor&quot;: &quot;wpkh([bf1dd55e/84'/0'/0']xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/0/*)#csvefu29&quot;,
  &quot;checksum&quot;: &quot;tpnxnxax&quot;,
  &quot;isrange&quot;: true,
  &quot;issolvable&quot;: true,
  &quot;hasprivatekeys&quot;: false
}
</code></pre>
<p>At para sa change address descriptor, sa case na ito <code>64k8wnd7</code>:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli getdescriptorinfo \
  'wpkh([bf1dd55e/84h/0h/0h]xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/1/*)'
</code></pre>
<pre><code class="language-json">{
  &quot;descriptor&quot;: &quot;wpkh([bf1dd55e/84'/0'/0']xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/1/*)#fyfc5f6a&quot;,
  &quot;checksum&quot;: &quot;64k8wnd7&quot;,
  &quot;isrange&quot;: true,
  &quot;issolvable&quot;: true,
  &quot;hasprivatekeys&quot;: false
}
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>I-load ang wallet na gusto mong i-import ang mga descriptor sa:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli loadwallet foo-watch-only
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Ngayon i-import ang mga descriptor, na may tamang mga checksum, sa Bitcoin Core.</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli \
 importdescriptors \
 '[
   {
     &quot;desc&quot;: &quot;wpkh([bf1dd55e/84h/0h/0h]xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/0/*)#tpnxnxax&quot;
     &quot;timestamp&quot;:0
   },
   {
     &quot;desc&quot;: &quot;wpkh([bf1dd55e/84h/0h/0h]xpub6CcJtWcvFQaMo39ANFi1MyXkEXM8T8ZhnxMtSjQAdPmVSTHYnc8Hwoc11VpuP8cb8JUTboZB5A7YYGDonYySij4XTawL6iNZvmZwdnSEEep/1/*)#64k8wnd7&quot;,
     &quot;timestamp&quot;:0
   }
 ]'
</code></pre>
<p>Kung alam mo ang timestamp ng Unix noong unang nagsimulang makatanggap ang iyong wallet transactions, maaari mo itong gamitin para sa value ng mga field na <code>&quot;timestamp&quot;</code> sa halip na <code>0</code>. Babawasan nito ang oras na kinakailangan para sa Bitcoin Core sa hanapin ang mga UTXOs.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Suriin kung gumagana ang lahat:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">bitcoin-cli getwalletinfo
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>Ipakita ang mga rare ordinal ng iyong wallet:</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">ord wallet sats
</code></pre>
</li>
</ol>
<h3 id="pag-export-ng-mga-descriptors"><a class="header" href="#pag-export-ng-mga-descriptors">Pag-export ng mga Descriptors</a></h3>
<h4 id="sparrow-wallet"><a class="header" href="#sparrow-wallet">Sparrow Wallet</a></h4>
<p>Mag-navigate sa tab na <code>Setting</code>, pagkatapos ay sa <code>Script Policy</code>, at pindutin ang i-edit button to display the descriptor.</p>
<h3 id="pag-transfer-ng-ordinals"><a class="header" href="#pag-transfer-ng-ordinals">Pag-transfer ng Ordinals</a></h3>
<p>Sinusuportahan ng <code>ord</code> wallet ang pag-transfer ng mga partikular na satoshi. Maaari mo ring gamitin ang <code>bitcoin-cli</code> commands <code>createrawtransaction</code>,<code>signrawtransactionwithwallet</code>, at <code>sendrawtransaction</code>, kung paano gawin ito ay kumplikado at sa labas ng saklaw ng gabay na ito.</p>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">

                                <i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i>
                            </a>

                        <div style="clear: both"></div>
                    </nav>

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="teleburning"><a class="header" href="#teleburning">Teleburning</a></h1>
<p>Teleburn addresses can be used to burn assets on other blockchains, leaving behind in the smoking rubble a sort of forwarding address pointing to an inscription on Bitcoin.</p>
<p>Teleburning an asset means something like, &quot;I'm out. Find me on Bitcoin.&quot;</p>
<p>Teleburn addresses are derived from inscription IDs. They have no corresponding private key, so assets sent to a teleburn address are burned. Currently, only Ethereum teleburn addresses are supported. Pull requests adding teleburn addresses for other chains are welcome.</p>
<h2 id="ethereum"><a class="header" href="#ethereum">Ethereum</a></h2>
<p>Ethereum teleburn addresses are derived by taking the first 20 bytes of the SHA-256 hash of the inscription ID, serialized as 36 bytes, with the first 32 bytes containing the transaction ID, and the last four bytes containing big-endian inscription index, and interpreting it as an Ethereum address.</p>
<h2 id="halimbawa"><a class="header" href="#halimbawa">Halimbawa</a></h2>
<p>The ENS domain name <a href="https://app.ens.domains/rodarmor.eth">rodarmor.eth</a>, was teleburned to <a href="https://ordinals.com/inscription/6fb976ab49dcec017f1e201e84395983204ae1a7c2abf7ced0a85d692e442799i0">inscription zero</a>.</p>
<p>Running the inscription ID of inscription zero is <code>6fb976ab49dcec017f1e201e84395983204ae1a7c2abf7ced0a85d692e442799i0</code>.</p>
<p>Passing <code>6fb976ab49dcec017f1e201e84395983204ae1a7c2abf7ced0a85d692e442799i0</code> to the teleburn command:</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">$ ord teleburn 6fb976ab49dcec017f1e201e84395983204ae1a7c2abf7ced0a85d692e442799i0
</code></pre>
<p>Returns:</p>
<pre><code class="language-json">{
  &quot;ethereum&quot;: &quot;0xe43A06530BdF8A4e067581f48Fae3b535559dA9e&quot;
}
</code></pre>
<p>Indicating that <code>0xe43A06530BdF8A4e067581f48Fae3b535559dA9e</code> is the Ethereum teleburn address for inscription zero, which is, indeed, the current owner, on Ethereum, of <code>rodarmor.eth</code>.</p>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                        <!-- Mobile navigation buttons -->
                            <a rel="prev" href="../guides/sat-hunting.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                            </a>

                            <a rel="next prefetch" href="../guides/collecting.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i>
                            </a>

                        <div style="clear: both"></div>
                    </nav>
                </div>
            </div>

            <nav class="nav-wide-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                    <a rel="prev" href="../guides/sat-hunting.html" class="nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">

                    </a>

<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html lang="fil" class="coal" dir="ltr">

        <!-- Book generated using mdBook -->
        <meta charset="UTF-8">
        <title>Pagsuri - Ordinal Theory Handbook</title>


        <!-- Custom HTML head -->

        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

        <link rel="icon" href="../favicon.svg">

        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../css/general.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../css/chrome.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../css/print.css" media="print">

        <!-- Fonts -->
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../fonts/fonts.css">

        <!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets -->
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../highlight.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../tomorrow-night.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="../ayu-highlight.css">

    <div id="body-container">
        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "../";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";
                          });

                          if (selectedLang) {
                              selectedLang.parentNode.classList.add("theme-selected");

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "guides/testing.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }
                        </script>

                    document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
                    Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);

                </script>

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="pagsuri"><a class="header" href="#pagsuri">Pagsuri</a></h1>
<p>Maaaring subukan ang Ord gamit ang mga sumusunod na flag upang tukuyin ang test network. Para sa higit pang impormasyon sa pagpapatakbo ng Bitcoin Core para sa testing, tingnan ang <a href="https://developer.bitcoin.org/examples/testing.html">Bitcoin's developer documentation</a>.</p>
<p>Karamihan sa commands ng <code>ord</code> sa <a href="inscriptions.html">inscriptions</a> at <a href="explorer.html">explorer</a> ay maaaring i-run gamit ang mga sumusunod na flag ng network:</p>
<div class="table-wrapper"><table><thead><tr><th>Network</th><th>Flag</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td>Testnet</td><td><code>--testnet</code> or <code>-t</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>Signet</td><td><code>--signet</code> or <code>-s</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>Regtest</td><td><code>--regtest</code> or <code>-r</code></td></tr>
</tbody></table>
</div>
<p>Ang regtest ay hindi nangangailangan ng pag-download ng blockchain o indexing ord.</p>
<h2 id="halimbawa"><a class="header" href="#halimbawa">Halimbawa</a></h2>
<p>I-run ang bitcoind sa regtest gamit ang:</p>
<pre><code>bitcoind -regtest -txindex
</code></pre>
<p>Gumawa ng wallet bilang regtest gamit ang:</p>
<pre><code>ord -r wallet create
</code></pre>
<p>Kumuha ng isang regtest receive address na may:</p>
<pre><code>ord -r wallet receive
</code></pre>
<p>Mine 101 blocks (upang i-unlock ang coinbase) gamit ang:</p>
<pre><code>bitcoin-cli -regtest generatetoaddress 101 &lt;receive address&gt;
</code></pre>
<p>I-inscribe sa regtest kasama:</p>
<pre><code>ord -r wallet inscribe --fee-rate 1 --file &lt;file&gt;
</code></pre>
<p>I-mine and inscription gamit ang:</p>
<pre><code>bitcoin-cli -regtest generatetoaddress 1 &lt;receive address&gt;
</code></pre>
<p>Tingnan ang inskripsiyon sa regtest explorer:</p>
<pre><code>ord -r server
</code></pre>
<h2 id="pag-test-ng-recursion"><a class="header" href="#pag-test-ng-recursion">Pag-test ng Recursion</a></h2>
<p>Kapag sinusubukan ang <a href="../inscriptions/recursion.html">recursion</a>, isulat ang mga dependencies muna (halimbawa sa <a href="https://p5js.org">p5.js</a>):</p>
<pre><code>ord -r wallet inscribe --fee-rate 1 --file p5.js
</code></pre>
<p>Dapat itong magbalik ng <code>inscription_id</code> na maaari mong ireference sa iyong recursive inscription.</p>
<p>PANSIN: Magiging iba ang mga id na ito kapag nag-inscribe sa mainnet o signet, kaya siguraduhing baguhin ang mga nasa iyong recursive inscription para sa bawat chain.</p>
<p>Pagkatapos ay maaari mong isulat ang iyong recursive inscription ng:</p>
<pre><code>ord -r wallet inscribe --fee-rate 1 --file recursive-inscription.html
</code></pre>
<p>Sa wakas, kakailanganin mong mag-mine ng ilang mga bloke at simulan ang server:</p>
<pre><code>bitcoin-cli generatetoaddress 6 &lt;receive address&gt;
ord -r server
</code></pre>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                        <!-- Mobile navigation buttons -->
                            <a rel="prev" href="../guides/collecting/sparrow-wallet.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                            </a>

                            <a rel="next prefetch" href="../guides/moderation.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i>
                            </a>

                        <div style="clear: both"></div>
                    </nav>
                </div>
            </div>

            <nav class="nav-wide-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                    <a rel="prev" href="../guides/collecting/sparrow-wallet.html" class="nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                        <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                    </a>

                    <a rel="next prefetch" href="../guides/moderation.html" class="nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">
                        <i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i>
                    </a>
            </nav>

        </div>

        <script src="../book.js"></script>

        <nav id="sidebar" class="sidebar" aria-label="Table of contents">
            <div class="sidebar-scrollbox">
                <ol class="chapter"><li class="chapter-item expanded affix "><a href="introduction.html">Panimula</a></li><li class="chapter-item expanded "><a href="overview.html"><strong         <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

        <div id="page-wrapper" class="page-wrapper">

                        <script>
                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";
                          });
                          let selectedLang = document.getElementById("fil");
                          if (selectedLang) {
                              selectedLang.parentNode.classList.add("theme-selected");
                          }

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "guides.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }
                        </script>

                <!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM -->
                <script>
                    document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
                    document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
                    Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
                    });
                </script>

## path: /fil/index.html  
url: https://github.com/ordinals/ord/blob/gh-pages/fil/index.html  

~~~  
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html lang="fil" class="coal" dir="ltr">
    <head>
        <!-- Book generated using mdBook -->
        <meta charset="UTF-8">
        <title>Panimula - Ordinal Theory Handbook</title>


        <!-- Custom HTML head -->
        
        <meta name="description" content="">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
        <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff">

        <link rel="icon" href="favicon.svg">
        <link rel="shortcut icon" href="favicon.png">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/variables.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/general.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/chrome.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/print.css" media="print">

        <!-- Fonts -->
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="fonts/fonts.css">

        <!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets -->
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="highlight.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="tomorrow-night.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="ayu-highlight.css">

        <!-- Custom theme stylesheets -->
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="language-picker.css">

    </head>
    <body class="sidebar-visible no-js">
    <div id="body-container">
        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

                </div>

                <div id="search-wrapper" class="hidden">

                        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
                    });

                    <main>
                        <h1 id="panimula"><a class="header" href="#panimula">Panimula</a></h1>
<p>Ang handbook na ito ay isang gabay sa pagunawa ng Ordinal Theory. Ang Ordinal Theory ay may kinalaman sa satoshi, kung saan nagbibigay ito ng indibidwal na pagkakakilanlan at nagpapahintulot sa kanila na masubaybayan, mailipat, at magbigay ng kahulugan.</p>
<p>Ang Satoshis, ay ang atomic, “native currency” ng Bitcoin network. Ang isang bitcoin ay maaaring hatiin sa 100,000,000 satoshis, at wala nang iba pa.</p>
<p>Ang Ordinal theory ay hindi nangangailangan ng sidechain o token bukod sa Bitcoin, at maaaring gamitin nang walang anumang pagbabago sa Bitcoin network.</p>
<p>Ang Ordinal theory ay nagbibigay sa satoshi ng numismatic na halaga, na nagdudulot para sa mga ito kolektahin at ipagpalit bilang mga ‘rare’ na bagay.</p>
<p>Ang mga indibidwal na satoshi ay maaaring ma-inscribe ng kahit anong arbitraryo nilalaman, na lumilikha ng mga natatanging “Bitcoin-native” digital na artifact na maaaring itago sa Bitcoin wallet at ilipat gamit ang mga transaksyong Bitcoin. Ang mga inskripsiyon ay hindi nababago, secure, at desentralisado gaya ng mismong Bitcoin.</p>
<p>At iba pa na hindi pangkaraniwang gamit nito ay: mga off-chain colored-coin, pampublikong imprastraktura ng key na may key rotation, isang desentralisadong kapalit ng DNS. Gayunpaman, sa ngayon, ang mga ganitong espekulasyon ng paggamit ay haka-haka, at umiiral lamang sa isipan ng mga “fringe ordinal theorists”.</p>
<p>Para sa higit pang mga detalye sa Ordinal Theory, tingnan ang <a href="overview.html">pangkalahatang-ideya</a></p>
<p>Para sa higit pang mga detalye sa mga inskripsiyon, tingnan ang mga <a href="inscriptions.html">inskripsiyon</a>.</p>
<p>Kapag handa ka na, isang magandang lugar na maaring magsimula ay ang <a href="guides/inscriptions.html">mga inskripsiyon</a>, isang kakaibang uri ng digital artifact na pinagana ng Ordinal Theory.</p>

<li><a href="https://x.com/ordinalsorg">Open Ordinals Institute X</a></li>
<li><a href="https://ordinals.com">Mainnet Block Explorer</a></li>
<li><a href="https://signet.ordinals.com">Signet Block Explorer</a></li>
</ul>

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="metadata"><a class="header" href="#metadata">Metadata</a></h1>
<p>Ang iscriptions ay maaring magkaroon ng <a href="https://cbor.io/">CBOR</a> metadata, na naka-store bilang data pushes sa fields na may tag <code>5</code>. Dahil limitado ang data pushes sa 520 bytes, Ang metadata na mas mahaba sa 520 byte ay dapat hatiin sa maraming tag na <code>5</code> fields, at pagkatapos ay pagsasamahin bago mag-decoding.</p>
<p>Ang metadata ay madaling basahin, at lahat ng metadata ay ipapakita sa user kasama ang inskripsiyon nito. Hinihikayat ang mga inscriber na isaalang-alang kung paano ang metadata ay ipapakita, at gagawing maigsi at kaakit-akit ang metadata.</p>
<p>Ang metadata ay nai-render sa HTML para ipakita tulad ng sumusunod:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>null</code>, <code>true</code>, <code>false</code>, numbers, floats, at strings ay rendered bilang isang plain text.</li>
<li>Ang Byte strings ay rendered bilang isang uppercase na hexadecimal.</li>
<li>Ang Arrays ay rendered gamit ang <code>&lt;ul&gt;</code> tags, kung saan ang mga element ay naka-wrapped sa <code>&lt;li&gt;</code> tags.</li>
<li>Maps ay rendered gamit ang <code>&lt;dl&gt;</code> tags, kung saan ang bawat key ay wrapped sa <code>&lt;dt&gt;</code> tags, at ang value nito ay naka-wrapped sa <code>&lt;dd&gt;</code> tags.</li>
<li>Tags ay rendered bilang tag , na naka-enclosed sa <code>&lt;sup&gt;</code> tag, kasunod ng value.</li>
</ul>
<p>Ang CBOR ay isang kumplikadong spec na may maraming iba't ibang uri ng data, at maraming paraan ng na kumakatawan sa parehong data. Mga kakaibang uri ng data, gaya ng mga tag, float, at Ang mga bignum, at pag-encode tulad ng mga hindi tiyak na halaga, ay maaaring mabigong ipakita tama o sa lahat. Ang mga kontribusyon sa <code>ord</code> upang malunasan ito ay malugod na tinatanggap.</p>
<h2 id="halimbawa"><a class="header" href="#halimbawa">Halimbawa</a></h2>
<p>Dahil ang CBOR ay hindi madaling basahin, sa mga halimbawang ito ay kinakatawan ito bilang JSON. Tandaan na ito ay halimbawa lamang, at ang JSON metadata ay <em>hindi</em> mapapakita nang tama.</p>
<p>Ang metadata na <code>{&quot;foo&quot;:&quot;bar&quot;,&quot;baz&quot;:[null,true,false,0]}</code> ay kasama sa isang inscription bilang:</p>
<pre><code>OP_FALSE
OP_IF
    ...
    OP_PUSH 0x05 OP_PUSH '{&quot;foo&quot;:&quot;bar&quot;,&quot;baz&quot;:[null,true,false,0]}'
    ...
OP_ENDIF
</code></pre>
<p>At ma-rendered bilang:</p>
<pre><code>&lt;dl&gt;
  ...
  &lt;dt&gt;metadata&lt;/dt&gt;
  &lt;dd&gt;
    &lt;dl&gt;
      &lt;dt&gt;foo&lt;/dt&gt;
      &lt;dd&gt;bar&lt;/dd&gt;
      &lt;dt&gt;baz&lt;/dt&gt;
      &lt;dd&gt;
        &lt;ul&gt;
          &lt;li&gt;null&lt;/li&gt;
          &lt;li&gt;true&lt;/li&gt;
          &lt;li&gt;false&lt;/li&gt;
          &lt;li&gt;0&lt;/li&gt;
        &lt;/ul&gt;
      &lt;/dd&gt;
    &lt;/dl&gt;
  &lt;/dd&gt;
  ...
&lt;/dl&gt;
</code></pre>
<p>Ang metadata na mas mahaba sa 520 byte ay dapat hatiin sa maraming fields:</p>
<pre><code>OP_FALSE
OP_IF
    ...
    OP_PUSH 0x05 OP_PUSH '{&quot;very&quot;:&quot;long&quot;,&quot;metadata&quot;:'
    OP_PUSH 0x05 OP_PUSH '&quot;is&quot;,&quot;finally&quot;:&quot;done&quot;}'
    ...
OP_ENDIF
</code></pre>
<p>Which would then be concatenated into <code>{&quot;very&quot;:&quot;long&quot;,&quot;metadata&quot;:&quot;is&quot;,&quot;finally&quot;:&quot;done&quot;}</code>.</p>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                        <!-- Mobile navigation buttons -->
                            <a rel="prev" href="../inscriptions.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                            </a>

                            <a rel="next prefetch" href="../inscriptions/provenance.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i>
                            </a>

                        <div style="clear: both"></div>
                    </nav>
                </div>
            </div>

            <nav class="nav-wide-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                    <a rel="prev" href="../inscriptions.html" class="nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                        <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                    </a>

                    </a>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')

            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="pointer"><a class="header" href="#pointer">Pointer</a></h1>
<p>In order to make an inscription on a sat other than the first of its input, a zero-based integer, called the &quot;pointer&quot;, can be provided with tag <code>2</code>, causing the inscription to be made on the sat at the given position in the outputs. If the pointer is equal to or greater than the number of total sats in the outputs of the inscribe transaction, it is ignored, and the inscription is made as usual. The value of the pointer field is a little endian integer, with trailing zeroes ignored.</p>
<p>An even tag is used, so that old versions of <code>ord</code> consider the inscription to be unbound, instead of assigning it, incorrectly, to the first sat.</p>
<p>This can be used to create multiple inscriptions in a single transaction on different sats, when otherwise they would be made on the same sat.</p>
<h2 id="examples"><a class="header" href="#examples">Examples</a></h2>
<p>An inscription with pointer 255:</p>
<pre><code>OP_FALSE
OP_IF
  OP_PUSH &quot;ord&quot;
  OP_PUSH 1
  OP_PUSH &quot;text/plain;charset=utf-8&quot;
  OP_PUSH 2
  OP_PUSH 0xff
  OP_PUSH 0
  OP_PUSH &quot;Hello, world!&quot;
OP_ENDIF
</code></pre>
<p>An inscription with pointer 256:</p>
<pre><code>OP_FALSE
OP_IF
  OP_PUSH &quot;ord&quot;
  OP_PUSH 1
  OP_PUSH &quot;text/plain;charset=utf-8&quot;
  OP_PUSH 2
  OP_PUSH 0x0001
  OP_PUSH 0
  OP_PUSH &quot;Hello, world!&quot;
OP_ENDIF
</code></pre>
<p>An inscription with pointer 256, with trailing zeroes, which are ignored:</p>
<pre><code>OP_FALSE
OP_IF
  OP_PUSH &quot;ord&quot;
  OP_PUSH 1
  OP_PUSH &quot;text/plain;charset=utf-8&quot;
  OP_PUSH 2
  OP_PUSH 0x000100
  OP_PUSH 0
  OP_PUSH &quot;Hello, world!&quot;
OP_ENDIF
</code></pre>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                        <!-- Mobile navigation buttons -->
                            <a rel="prev" href="../inscriptions/recursion.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                            </a>

                            <a rel="next prefetch" href="../faq.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i>
                            </a>

                        <div style="clear: both"></div>
                    </nav>
                </div>
            </div>

            <nav class="nav-wide-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                    <a rel="prev" href="../inscriptions/recursion.html" class="nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                        <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>

        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";

                          // language into account.

                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).

                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="provenance"><a class="header" href="#provenance">Provenance</a></h1>
<p>Ang may-ari ng isang inscription ay maaaring lumikha ng mga child inscription, na sinisiguro na ng pinagmulan ng mga child inscription na nasa on-chain na kabilang sa nilikha ng may-ari ng isang parent inscription. Magagamit ito para sa mga koleksyon, kung saan ang mga child inscription ng parent inscription ay mga miyembro ng parehong koleksyon.</p>
<p>Kahit ang mga child inscription ay maaaring magkaroon ng mga child inscriptions, na nagbibigay-daan para magkaroon ng hierarchy. Halimbawa, maaring gumawa ang artist ng parent inscription na maraming child inscription na kung saan may mga sub inscription pa ang mga ito, na kung saan ang mga children at may sub inscription na kabilang din sa mga koleksyon.</p>
<h3 id="pagtutukoy"><a class="header" href="#pagtutukoy">Pagtutukoy</a></h3>
<p>Upang lumikha ng child inscription C na may parent inscription P:</p>
<ul>
<li>Gumawa ng inscribe transaction T gaya ng dati para sa C.</li>
<li>I-spend ang parent inscription P sa isa sa mga input ng T.</li>
<li>Isama ang tag <code>3</code>, ibig sabihin <code>OP_PUSH 3</code>, sa C, na may value ng serialized binary inscription ID ng P, na naka-serialize bilang 32-byte <code>TXID</code>, na sinusundan ng apat na byte na little-endian <code>INDEX</code>, kung saan ang mga trailing zeroes ay hindi kasama.</li>
</ul>
<p><em>NB</em> Ang mga byte ng isang bitcoin transaction ID ay nababaligtad sa kanilang text representation, kaya ang serialized transaction ID ay nasa kabaligtaran ang pagkakasunodsunod.</p>
<h3 id="halimbawa"><a class="header" href="#halimbawa">Halimbawa</a></h3>
<p>Isang halimbawa ng child inscription <code>000102030405060708090a0b0c0d0e0f101112131415161718191a1b1c1d1e1fi0</code>:</p>
<pre><code>OP_FALSE
OP_IF
  OP_PUSH &quot;ord&quot;
  OP_PUSH 1
  OP_PUSH &quot;text/plain;charset=utf-8&quot;
  OP_PUSH 3
  OP_PUSH 0x1f1e1d1c1b1a191817161514131211100f0e0d0c0b0a09080706050403020100
  OP_PUSH 0
  OP_PUSH &quot;Hello, world!&quot;
OP_ENDIF
</code></pre>
<p>Tandaan na ang halaga ng tag <code>3</code> ay binary, hindi hex, at para makilala ang child inscription bilang isang child, <code>000102030405060708090a0b0c0d0e0f101112131415161718191a1b1c1d1e1fi0</code> dapat na gastusin bilang isa sa mga input ng inscription transaction.</p>
<p>Halimbawang pag-encode ng inscription ID <code>000102030405060708090a0b0c0d0e0f101112131415161718191a1b1c1d1e1fi255</code>:</p>
<pre><code>OP_FALSE
OP_IF
  …
  OP_PUSH 3
  OP_PUSH 0x1f1e1d1c1b1a191817161514131211100f0e0d0c0b0a09080706050403020100ff
  …
OP_ENDIF
</code></pre>
<p>At ng inskripsiyong ID <code>000102030405060708090a0b0c0d0e0f101112131415161718191a1b1c1d1e1fi256</code>:</p>
<pre><code>OP_FALSE
OP_IF
  …
  OP_PUSH 3
  OP_PUSH 0x1f1e1d1c1b1a191817161514131211100f0e0d0c0b0a090807060504030201000001
  …
OP_ENDIF
</code></pre>
<h3 id="tandaan"><a class="header" href="#tandaan">Tandaan</a></h3>
<p><code>3</code> Ginagamit ang tag dahil ito ang unang available na odd tag. Ang mga hindi kilalang odd tag ay hindi gumagawa ng isang inskripsiyon na unbound, kaya ang mga child inscription ay makikilala at masusubaybayan ng mga lumang bersyon ng ord.</p>
<p>Maaaring i-close ang isang koleksyon sa pamamagitan ng pag-burn sa parent isncription ng koleksyon, na ginagarantiyahan na wala nang mga item sa koleksyon ang maaaring maibigay.</p>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                        <!-- Mobile navigation buttons -->
                            <a rel="prev" href="../inscriptions/metadata.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                            </a>

                            <a rel="next prefetch" href="../inscriptions/recursion.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i>
                            </a>

                        <div style="clear: both"></div>
                    </nav>
                </div>
            </div>

            <nav class="nav-wide-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">

                    </a>

        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "../";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

                           <li role="none"><button role="menuitem" class="theme">

                          </button></li>

                        <script>
                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";
                          });
                          let selectedLang = document.getElementById("fil");
                          if (selectedLang) {
                              selectedLang.parentNode.classList.add("theme-selected");
                          }

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "inscriptions/recursion.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }
                        </script>

                    document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');

                        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="recursion"><a class="header" href="#recursion">Recursion</a></h1>
<p>Ang isang eksepsyon sa <a href="../inscriptions.html#sandboxing">sandboxing</a> ay ang recursion: pinahihintulutan ang pag-access sa endpoint ng <code>ord’s</code> <code>/content</code>, na nagdudulot sa mga inskripsiyon na ma-access ang nilalaman ng iba pang mga inskripsiyon sa pamamagitan ng paggamit ng <code>/content/&lt;INSCRIPTION_ID&gt;</code>.</p>
<p>Ito ay nagdudulot ng magagandang use-cases:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Paggamit sa mga existing na inskripsyon.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Pag-publish ng mga snippet ng code, mga larawan, audio, o mga stylesheet bilang pampublikong resources.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Mga generative na koleksyon kung saan ang isang algorithm ay nakalagay bilang JavaScript, na nag awtomatiko sa pag-create ng maraming inskripsyon na may kanya-kanyang katangian.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Mga generative na koleksyon ng profile picture kung saan ang mga accessory at attribute ay naka-inscribe bilang mga indibidwal na larawan, o sa isang shared texture atlas, at pagkatapos ay pinagsama, parang collage, na may kanya kanyang combinasyon.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>The recursive endpoints are:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>/r/blockhash/&lt;HEIGHT&gt;</code>: block hash at given block height.</li>
<li><code>/r/blockhash</code>: latest block hash.</li>
<li><code>/r/blockheight</code>: latest block height.</li>
<li><code>/r/blocktime</code>: UNIX time stamp of latest block.</li>
<li><code>/r/children/&lt;INSCRIPTION_ID&gt;</code>: the first 100 child inscription ids.</li>
<li><code>/r/children/&lt;INSCRIPTION_ID&gt;/&lt;PAGE&gt;</code>: the set of 100 child inscription ids on <code>&lt;PAGE&gt;</code>.</li>
<li><code>/r/metadata/&lt;INSCRIPTION_ID&gt;</code>: JSON string containing the hex-encoded CBOR metadata.</li>
<li><code>/r/sat/&lt;SAT_NUMBER&gt;</code>: the first 100 inscription ids on a sat.</li>
<li><code>/r/sat/&lt;SAT_NUMBER&gt;/&lt;PAGE&gt;</code>: the set of 100 inscription ids on <code>&lt;PAGE&gt;</code>.</li>
<li><code>/r/sat/&lt;SAT_NUMBER&gt;/at/&lt;INDEX&gt;</code>: the inscription id at <code>&lt;INDEX&gt;</code> of all inscriptions on a sat. <code>&lt;INDEX&gt;</code> may be a negative number to index from the back. <code>0</code> being the first and <code>-1</code> being the most recent for example.</li>
</ul>
<p>Note: <code>&lt;SAT_NUMBER&gt;</code> only allows the actual number of a sat no other sat notations like degree, percentile or decimal. We may expand to allow those in the future.</p>
<p>Responses from the above recursive endpoints are JSON. For backwards compatibility additional endpoints are supported, some of which return plain-text responses.</p>
<ul>
<li><code>/blockheight</code>: pinakabagong block height.</li>
<li><code>/blockhash</code>: pinakabagong block hash.</li>
<li><code>/blockhash/&lt;HEIGHT&gt;</code>: block hash sa ibinigay na block height.</li>
<li><code>/blocktime</code>: UNIX time stamp ng pinakabagong block.</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="examples"><a class="header" href="#examples">Examples</a></h2>
<ul>
<li><code>/r/blockheight</code>:</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-json">777000
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li><code>/r/blockhash/0</code>:</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-json">&quot;000000000019d6689c085ae165831e934ff763ae46a2a6c172b3f1b60a8ce26f&quot;
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li><code>/r/blocktime</code>:</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-json">1700770905
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li><code>/r/metadata/35b66389b44535861c44b2b18ed602997ee11db9a30d384ae89630c9fc6f011fi3</code>:</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-json">&quot;a2657469746c65664d656d6f727966617574686f726e79656c6c6f775f6f72645f626f74&quot;
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li><code>/r/sat/1023795949035695</code>:</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-json">{
   &quot;ids&quot;:[
      &quot;17541f6adf6eb160d52bc6eb0a3546c7c1d2adfe607b1a3cddc72cc0619526adi0&quot;
   ],
   &quot;more&quot;:false,
   &quot;page&quot;:0
}
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li><code>/r/sat/1023795949035695/at/-1</code>:</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-json">{
   &quot;id&quot;:&quot;17541f6adf6eb160d52bc6eb0a3546c7c1d2adfe607b1a3cddc72cc0619526adi0&quot;
}
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li><code>/r/children/60bcf821240064a9c55225c4f01711b0ebbcab39aa3fafeefe4299ab158536fai0/49</code>:</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-json">{
   &quot;ids&quot;:[
      &quot;7cd66b8e3a63dcd2fada917119830286bca0637267709d6df1ca78d98a1b4487i4900&quot;,
      &quot;7cd66b8e3a63dcd2fada917119830286bca0637267709d6df1ca78d98a1b4487i4901&quot;,
      ...
      &quot;7cd66b8e3a63dcd2fada917119830286bca0637267709d6df1ca78d98a1b4487i4935&quot;,
      &quot;7cd66b8e3a63dcd2fada917119830286bca0637267709d6df1ca78d98a1b4487i4936&quot;
   ],
   &quot;more&quot;:false,
   &quot;page&quot;:49
}
</code></pre>

                    </main>

        <script>
            var path_to_root = "";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                <!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM -->
                <script>
                    document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
                    document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
                    Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
                    });
                </script>

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="inscriptions"><a class="header" href="#inscriptions">Inscriptions</a></h1>
<p>Ang inscriptions ay sats na naglalaman ng arbitraryong content, na lumilikha ng bitcoin-native digital artifact, na mas karaniwang kilala bilang NFTs. Ang mga inskripsiyon ay hindi nangangailangan ng sidechain o hiwalay na token.</p>
<p>Ang mga naka-inscribe na sat na ito ay maaaring ilipat gamit ang mga transaksyon sa bitcoin, ipadala sa mga bitcoin address, at gamitin sa mga bitcoin UTXO. Ang mga transaksyon, address, at UTXO na ito ay normal na mga transaksyon sa bitcoin, address, at UTXOS sa lahat ng aspeto, maliban nalang para makapagpadala ng mga indibidwal na sats, dapat kontrolin ng transaksyon ang pagkakasunud-sunod at halaga ng mga input at output ayon sa ordinal theory.</p>
<p>Ang modelo ng inscription content ay sa web. Ang isang inskripsiyon ay binubuo ng isang uri ng nilalaman, na kilala rin bilang MIME type, at ang nilalaman mismo ay isang byte string. Ito ay nagbibigay-daan sa nilalaman ng inskripsiyon na maibalik mula sa isang web server, at para sa paglikha ng mga HTML inscriptions na gumagamit at nagbubuo ng nilalaman ng iba pang mga inskripsiyon.</p>
<p>Ang nilalaman ng inskripsiyon ay on-chain, na naka-imbak sa taproot script-path spend scripts. Ang mga script ng Taproot ay may limitasyon sa kanilang nilalaman, at bukod pa rito ay tumatanggap ng witness discount, na ginagawang matipid ang pag-iimbak ang nilalaman ng isang inskripsiyon.</p>
<p>Dahil ang spend ng taproot script ay maaari lamang gawin mula sa mga kasalukuyang taproot output, ang mga inskripsiyon ay ginawa gamit ang isang two-phase commit/reveal procedure. Una, sa commit transaction, isang taproot output na nag-committ sa isang script na naglalaman ng inskripsyon ay nabuo. Pangalawa, sa reveal ng transaksyon, ang output na nilikha ng commit na transaksyon ay ginamit sa pagbayad, na mag-rereveal ng inscription content sa on-chain.</p>
<p>Ang nilalaman ng inskripsiyon ay naka-serialize gamit ang data pushes sa loob ng mga hindi naisagawang kondisyon, na tinatawag na &quot;envelopes&quot;. Ang envelopes ay binubuo ng isang <code>OP_FALSE OP_IF ...OP_ENDIF</code> na nag-wawrap sa kahit anong numero ng data pushes. Dahil ang envelopes ay epektibong no-ops, hindi nito binabago ang semantika ng script kung saan kasama ang mga ito, at maaaring isama sa anumang iba pang locking script.</p>
<p>Isang text inscription na naglalaman ng string na &quot;Hello, world!&quot; ay serialized tulad ng sumusunod:</p>
<pre><code>OP_FALSE
OP_IF
  OP_PUSH &quot;ord&quot;
  OP_PUSH 1
  OP_PUSH &quot;text/plain;charset=utf-8&quot;
  OP_PUSH 0
  OP_PUSH &quot;Hello, world!&quot;
OP_ENDIF
</code></pre>
<p>Una ang string na <code>ord</code> ay pushed, upang i-dismbiguate ang mga inskripsiyon mula sa iba pang gamit ng envelopes.</p>
<p>Ang <code>OP_PUSH 1</code> ay nagpapahiwatig na ang susunod na push ay naglalaman ng content type, at <code>OP_PUSH 0</code> naman ay nagpapahiwatig na ang mga kasunod na data ay naglalaman ng content mismo. Dapat gumamit ng maraming push data para sa isang malalaking inskripsiyon, dahil ito sa limitasyon ng taproot, na kung saan hindi maaring lumagpas sa 520 bytes ang bawat isang data push.</p>
<p>Ang nilalaman ng inskripsyon ay nakapaloob sa input ng isang naka-reveal na transaksyon sa Bitcoin, at ang inskripsyon ay nagawa sa unang sat ng input nito. Ang sat na ito ay maaaring masubaybayan gamit ang pamilyar na mga panuntunan ng ordinal theory, na nagreresulta sa ito na ilipat, bilhin, ibenta, mawala sa mga fees, at ma-recover.</p>
<h2 id="content"><a class="header" href="#content">Content</a></h2>
<p>Ang data model ng mga inskripsiyon ay isang HTTP response, na nagbibigay-daan sa nilalaman ng inskripsiyon na maipakita gamit ang web server at nang web browser.</p>
<h2 id="fields"><a class="header" href="#fields">Fields</a></h2>
<p>Ang inskripsiyon ay maaring magkaroon ng fields bago ang optional body. Ang bawat field ay binubuo ng dalawang data pushes, isang tag at isang value.</p>
<p>Currently, there are six defined fields:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>content_type</code>, with a tag of <code>1</code>, whose value is the MIME type of the body.</li>
<li><code>pointer</code>, with a tag of <code>2</code>, see <a href="./inscriptions/pointer.html">pointer docs</a>.</li>
<li><code>parent</code>, with a tag of <code>3</code>, see <a href="./inscriptions/provenance.html">provenance</a>.</li>
<li><code>metadata</code>, with a tag of <code>5</code>, see <a href="./inscriptions/metadata.html">metadata</a>.</li>
<li><code>metaprotocol</code>, with a tag of <code>7</code>, whose value is the metaprotocol identifier.</li>
<li><code>content_encoding</code>, with a tag of <code>9</code>, whose value is the encoding of the body.</li>
</ul>
<p>Ang simula ng body at dulo ng mga fields ay mayroong isang walang laman na data push.</p>
<p>Ang mga hindi unkown tag ay sinusuri depende sa kung even o odd ang mga ito, na sumusunod sa panuntunang &quot;it's okay to be odd&quot; na ginagamit ng Lightning Network.</p>
<p>Ang mga tag na ginagamit para sa fields ay maaaring makaapekto sa pag-create, paunang pagtatalaga, o paglipat ng isang inskripsiyon. Kaya, ang mga inskripsiyon na unknown at kahit na ang fields ay dapat na ipakita bilang &quot;unbound&quot;, iyon ay, walang lokasyon.</p>
<p>Odd tags ay hindi nakakaapekto sa paggawa, paunang pagtatalaga, o paglilipat, gaya ng karagdagang metadata, at sa gayon ay ligtas na huwag pansinin.</p>
<h2 id="inscription-ids"><a class="header" href="#inscription-ids">Inscription IDs</a></h2>
<p>Ang nilalaman ng inskripsyon ay nakapaloob sa input ng isang naka-reveal na transaksyon. Upang natatanging makilala ang mga ito, binibigyan sila ng ID, tulad ng:</p>
<p><code>521f8eccffa4c41a3a7728dd012ea5a4a02feed81f41159231251ecf1e5c79dai0</code></p>
<p>Ang bahagi sa harap na <code>i</code> ay ang transaction ID (txid) ng reveal na transaksyon. Ang numero pagkatapos ng <code>i</code> ay tumutukoy sa index (nagsisimula sa 0) ng mga bagong inskripsiyon ng transaksyon.</p>
<p>Maaaring matatagpuan ang mga inskripsiyon sa iba't ibang input, sa loob ng parehong input o kumbinasyon ng pareho. Sa anumang kaso ang order ay madaling makita, dahil ang parser nage-scan sa mga input nang sunud-sunod at hahanapin ang lahat ng inskripsiyon na may <code>envelopes</code>.</p>
<div class="table-wrapper"><table><thead><tr><th style="text-align: center">Input</th><th style="text-align: center">Inscription Count</th><th style="text-align: center">Indices</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td style="text-align: center">0</td><td style="text-align: center">2</td><td style="text-align: center">i0, i1</td></tr>
<tr><td style="text-align: center">1</td><td style="text-align: center">1</td><td style="text-align: center">i2</td></tr>
<tr><td style="text-align: center">2</td><td style="text-align: center">3</td><td style="text-align: center">i3, i4, i5</td></tr>
<tr><td style="text-align: center">3</td><td style="text-align: center">0</td><td style="text-align: center"></td></tr>
<tr><td style="text-align: center">4</td><td style="text-align: center">1</td><td style="text-align: center">i6</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
</div>
<h2 id="sandboxing"><a class="header" href="#sandboxing">Sandboxing</a></h2>
<p>Ang mga inskripsiyon na gaya ng HTML at SVG ay nasa-sandbox upang maiwasan ang ma-reference sa off-chain content, sa gayo'y pinapanatili ang mga inskripsiyon na hindi nababago at self-contained.</p>
<p>Nagagawa ito sa pamamagitan ng pag-load sa mga HTML at SVG na inskripsiyon sa loob <code>iframes</code> na may <code>sandbox</code> na katangian, pati na rin ang pag-serve ng nilalaman ng inskripsiyon na may <code>Content-Security-Policy</code> sa header.</p>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                        <!-- Mobile navigation buttons -->
                            <a rel="prev" href="digital-artifacts.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                            </a>

                            <a rel="next prefetch" href="inscriptions/metadata.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i>
                            </a>

                        <div style="clear: both"></div>
                    </nav>
                </div>
            </div>

            <nav class="nav-wide-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                    <a rel="prev" href="digital-artifacts.html" class="nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">

                        <i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i>
                    </a>
            </nav>

        </div>

            var path_to_root = "";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

            var body = document.querySelector('body');

            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");

                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="panimula"><a class="header" href="#panimula">Panimula</a></h1>
<p>Ang handbook na ito ay isang gabay sa pagunawa ng Ordinal Theory. Ang Ordinal Theory ay may kinalaman sa satoshi, kung saan nagbibigay ito ng indibidwal na pagkakakilanlan at nagpapahintulot sa kanila na masubaybayan, mailipat, at magbigay ng kahulugan.</p>
<p>Ang Satoshis, ay ang atomic, “native currency” ng Bitcoin network. Ang isang bitcoin ay maaaring hatiin sa 100,000,000 satoshis, at wala nang iba pa.</p>
<p>Ang Ordinal theory ay hindi nangangailangan ng sidechain o token bukod sa Bitcoin, at maaaring gamitin nang walang anumang pagbabago sa Bitcoin network.</p>
<p>Ang Ordinal theory ay nagbibigay sa satoshi ng numismatic na halaga, na nagdudulot para sa mga ito kolektahin at ipagpalit bilang mga ‘rare’ na bagay.</p>
<p>Ang mga indibidwal na satoshi ay maaaring ma-inscribe ng kahit anong arbitraryo nilalaman, na lumilikha ng mga natatanging “Bitcoin-native” digital na artifact na maaaring itago sa Bitcoin wallet at ilipat gamit ang mga transaksyong Bitcoin. Ang mga inskripsiyon ay hindi nababago, secure, at desentralisado gaya ng mismong Bitcoin.</p>
<p>At iba pa na hindi pangkaraniwang gamit nito ay: mga off-chain colored-coin, pampublikong imprastraktura ng key na may key rotation, isang desentralisadong kapalit ng DNS. Gayunpaman, sa ngayon, ang mga ganitong espekulasyon ng paggamit ay haka-haka, at umiiral lamang sa isipan ng mga “fringe ordinal theorists”.</p>
<p>Para sa higit pang mga detalye sa Ordinal Theory, tingnan ang <a href="overview.html">pangkalahatang-ideya</a></p>
<p>Para sa higit pang mga detalye sa mga inskripsiyon, tingnan ang mga <a href="inscriptions.html">inskripsiyon</a>.</p>
<p>Kapag handa ka na, isang magandang lugar na maaring magsimula ay ang <a href="guides/inscriptions.html">mga inskripsiyon</a>, isang kakaibang uri ng digital artifact na pinagana ng Ordinal Theory.</p>
<h2 id="mga-link"><a class="header" href="#mga-link">Mga Link</a></h2>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ordinals/ord/">GitHub</a></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ordinals/ord/blob/master/bip.mediawiki">BIP</a></li>
<li><a href="https://discord.gg/ordinals">Discord</a></li>
<li><a href="https://ordinals.org/">Open Ordinals Institute Website</a></li>
<li><a href="https://x.com/ordinalsorg">Open Ordinals Institute X</a></li>
<li><a href="https://ordinals.com">Mainnet Block Explorer</a></li>
<li><a href="https://signet.ordinals.com">Signet Block Explorer</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="mga-video"><a class="header" href="#mga-video">Mga Video</a></h2>
<ul>

<li><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j5V33kV3iqo">Ordinal Art: Mint Your own NFTs on Bitcoin w/ @rodarmor</a></li>
</ul>

                    </main>

            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');

                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {

            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');

                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;

                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons

                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
